oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Finger weeder for cabbage and lettuce cultures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Leinonen, P.
Saastamoinen, A.
Vilmunen, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Summer 2002 we compared finger weeder against net harrow and herbicides in cabbage. Field trial 2003 was dedicated to lettuce: we compared different intensities of finger weeding in two different lettuce cultivars.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Leinonen, P.; Saastamoinen, A. and Vilmunen, J. (2004) Finger weeder for cabbage and lettuce cultures. Paper at: 6th EWRS workshop on physical and cultural weed control, Lillehammer, Norway, 8-10 March 2004.
